entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of wet flurries this morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Snow level 900 metres. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023
